basejump
  • Reference

Markdown List

Markdown List

mdList(object, ...)

# S4 method for character
mdList(object, ordered = FALSE, asis = FALSE)

Arguments

object

Object.
...

Additional arguments.
ordered

Ordered (TRUE; 1.) or unordered (FALSE; -) list in Markdown format.
asis

Set this to TRUE when using the function inside a loop or inside an RMarkdown chunk with results="asis" enabled.

See also

Other Report Utilities: kables, mdHeader

Examples

groceries <- c("milk", "eggs")
mdList(groceries)
#> [1] "- milk\n" "- eggs\n"
#> attr(,"format")
#> [1] "markdown"
#> attr(,"class")
#> [1] "knit_asis"
#> attr(,"knit_cacheable")
#> [1] NA
mdList(groceries, ordered = TRUE)
#> [1] "1. milk\n" "2. eggs\n"
#> attr(,"format")
#> [1] "markdown"
#> attr(,"class")
#> [1] "knit_asis"
#> attr(,"knit_cacheable")
#> [1] NA
mdList(groceries, asis = TRUE)
#> 
#> - milk
#> - eggs
#>
